On behalf of Princeton Bendheim Center for Finance and our Center Director Markus Brunnermeier, you are cordially invited to attend a Fireside Chat followed by a Cocktail Reception during Princeton Reunions, in celebration of the 20th anniversary of the BCF Master in Finance program.
Fireside Chat
with Princeton Economics Alumnus
Sharmin Mossavar-Rahmani (’80)
and
BCF Director Markus Brunnermeier
Friday, May 20, 2022
4:00 pm
McCosh 10
Followed by
Cocktail Reception
6:00 pm
26 Prospect Lawn
Attire: Smart Business Casual
You may RSVP for one or both events via
this link
.
If you have questions or need more information, please contact Jessica Roethel at
bcf@princeton.edu
.
